title: "Public corporation" defined
context: ยง212-2 &ldquo;Public corporation&rdquo; defined. As used in this chapter, &ldquo;public corporation&rdquo; means the State of Hawaii, any political subdivision thereof, and municipality therein, or any public agency of the State. [L 1963, c 7, ยง3; Supp, ยง98T-3; HRS ยง212-2]
